page.title: 16ARTS AND CRAFTS IN CLANFIELD
page.content: The Country Park Centre is used as a venue for visiting craftsmen to demonstrate their particular skills.A keen public interest is taken in the display of traditional crafts.Spinning and weaving on a hand loom is shown through all the stages from the preparation of the raw fleece to the wool ready for use.Hand tooled decorative leatherwork especially belts are in great demand as are the original designs of sterling silver ware.Life_like,accurately coloured carvings of the birds common to the park make attractive gifts for sale together with the hand painted pottery ware.The ancient craft of the wattle hurdle maker is demonstrated in the forestry display area.Future plans include open air theatre productions staged in natural settings in the park and outdoor art classes.
